page.title: 09My Country Pursuits.
page.content: I help my dad to take chemicals to farms and see all the animals.We walk in the fields to see if the crops have got any diseases.If they haven't got a sprayer,my dad can get the spraying machine.He has a shop where he sells wormer and drench and hires out a bird scarer machine. I do horse riding and I can jump about five feet.You have to muck out every week.You have to clean all your tack. The leather has to be cleaned with saddle soap.When the coat of the horse is very dirty you have to get a little bowl of water and tip it all over the horse.Then brush it down. I go shooting with my dad.Every time you go to a competition you have to clean the gun.You have to clean the barrels so that it doesn't affect the shot.
